# Milvus Lite Text Search Demo

This workspace contains a simple demonstration of using Milvus Lite for text search with vector embeddings.

## Project Overview
- Python-based demo using Milvus Lite (lightweight vector database)
- Shows text search using sentence embeddings
- Demonstrates collection creation, data insertion, and similarity search

## Key Technologies
- pymilvus: Milvus Python SDK with Milvus Lite support
- sentence-transformers: For generating text embeddings
- Python 3.8+

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code simple and educational
- Include clear comments explaining Milvus concepts
- Use meaningful example data for text search demonstrations
